title: Ishqiya
overview: Hamna and Rumaisa are sisters raised by overprotective parents. Hamna is quiet, peaceful and reserved while Rumi is carefree, outgoing and talkative, but both love their father dearly. Hamna and her college classmate Hamza (Feroze Khan) are madly in love. Hamna is hesitant to tell her father that she is in love as he doesn't believe in love marriages.
